backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing users, conversations, messages, calls, and friendships with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, affected files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and recent behavior changes.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining light/dark theme color tokens and applying base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up metadata, fonts, and root container for the frontend app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling initialization, error recovery, onboarding flow, and rendering the chat and call UI.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Exports application name and tagline branding constants.
frontend/src/constants/buildInfo.ts: Provides a build identifier sourced from environment variables or document metadata.
frontend/src/features/auth/LoginView.tsx: Deprecated login screen retained for compatibility and no longer used in the app flow.
frontend/src/features/auth/NameStartView: Onboarding component for capturing and storing a user's display name before entering the app.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallChip.tsx: Renders a minimized call control chip with peer info and mute/end actions, updating server call status on end.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallDiagnost: Displays a diagnostics panel showing call status, direction, call ID state, and any signaling errors.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallProvider: Implements context for managing active call session state, mute/minimize behavior, and peer connection lifecycle.
frontend/src/features/calls/CallScreen.t: Handles full in-call UI, media acquisition, WebRTC setup, signaling, and backend call lifecycle updates.
frontend/src/features/calls/IncomingCall: Shows a dialog for accepting or declining an incoming voice or video call with caller details.
Polls for incoming calls, shows the incoming call dialog, and handles acceptance with WebRTC answer flow.
frontend/src/features/calls/useCallSigna: React hook that watches a call session and triggers callbacks when status, offer, or answer change.
frontend/src/features/calls/useIncomingC: Polls the backend for pending incoming calls on an interval with retry handling.
frontend/src/features/calls/useLocalMedi: Manages acquiring, toggling, and cleaning up local audio/video MediaStreams with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/features/calls/webrtc.ts: Utility functions for creating and managing RTCPeerConnections, offers, answers, and media tracks.
frontend/src/features/chat/ChatShell.tsx: Main chat layout that manages conversation selection, friend request dialog, and new chat dialog state.
frontend/src/features/chat/ConversationL: Renders the user’s conversations, marking unread items and allowing selection or deletion.
frontend/src/features/chat/FriendRequest: Dialog listing pending friend requests with accept/decline actions and user info loading.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageCompos: Provides a message composer UI allowing text and image messages with previews and upload progress, sending via mutation.
frontend/src/features/chat/MessageThread: Displays a conversation thread with messages, auto-scrolling, read marking, and call-starting actions.
frontend/src/features/chat/NewChatDialog: Implements a dialog for searching users, managing friendship actions, and starting new conversations.
frontend/src/features/chat/time.ts: Utility functions for formatting message timestamps into relative or readable time strings.
frontend/src/features/chat/useMessagePol: Sets up periodic polling to refresh messages, conversations, and unread status for a conversation.
frontend/src/features/init/InitErrorScre: Renders an initialization error UI with summaries, contextual guidance, technical details, and retry/reset actions.
frontend/src/features/init/resetLocalApp: Clears all locally stored identity, profile, and session data for a full app reset.
frontend/src/features/init/sanitizeInitE: Sanitizes initialization errors by removing sensitive info, classifying error types, and generating safe summaries.
frontend/src/features/profile/AppInfoHel: Dialog showing app URL, build info, diagnostics, and copy/refresh controls.
frontend/src/features/profile/ChangeDisp: Dialog for updating the user display name with mutation, validation, and UI feedback.
frontend/src/features/profile/DisplayNam: Onboarding screen allowing new users to set and register a display name.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileMen: Profile dropdown showing user info and actions including name change, app info, and sign out.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provider and hook for managing Internet Identity authentication, login state, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalActor.ts: Initializes a backend actor using a locally stored identity, performs health checks, and optionally applies an admin token with detailed error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for conversations, messages, user search, messaging actions, and other backend interactions via the local actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS base styles and a light/dark OKLCH color theme with layout and safe‑area adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/localIdentity.ts: Handles generation, serialization, loading, and cleanup of an Ed25519 identity in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/localProfile.ts: Manages display name and onboarding completion state in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining color tokens, themes, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Project state file describing schema version, issues, and implemented features related to startup initialization and admin-token handling.
